roleset.name: certain to be remembered
roleset.note: UNFORGETTABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7, relation to forget.01. (from unforgettable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: The woes inflicted by " Taiwan independence " guidelines on the Taiwanese people are unforgettable .
example.arg: The woes inflicted by " Taiwan independence " guidelines on the Taiwanese people
